text:
HSSFWorkbook.getNameIndex() should do a case-insensitive comparison against the 
names.

To verify this, try (in Excel) to create two named ranges (with different cell references) that 
differ only in case.
creator: doug@dougandalli.com
jheight@apache.org
text:
Fixed in SVN. Also will throw an exception if two same names (case insensitive)
are attempted to be added to the workbook (Remove one first).

Jason
